dcterms:description: The MobiAct dataset is used for the recognition of activities of daily living using smartphones, containing data collected from 61 subjects performing 11 daily activities.
dcterms:title: MobiAct

dcterms:creator: D. Anguita
A. Ghio
L. Oneto
X. Parra

dcterms:description: The UCI-HAR dataset is a public domain dataset for human activity recognition using smartphones, acquired from 30 subjects performing 6 basic activities of daily living.
dcterms:title: UCI-HAR
